reviewText: Nothing wrong with it. I am not a football fan. I got it for a tailgate themed lunch at work.

Got for my grandsons and they did enjoy it but it was not very long.
But yes very fun to watch
I bought this DVD for my dad who is 92 and he was just laughing up a storm.  It was a great gift for his birthday.  I am glad it was available for such a great price.  Thank you.
I got this to show to my 4th grade class. There was quite a bit of inappropriate stuff on it and I could not show very much.

I think NFL Films has lost the idea of Follies, these recent videos (3 & 4) are just film of bad plays or stupid mistakes, not funny misques by the best in the game.  Still a enjoyable rewatchable show.

NFL Networks puts out some great productions.  This one is funny but it seems to have the same scenes as quite a few of their other DVD's they've put out.  If you don't already have a large NFL DVD collection, then this one is definitely a good buy.  If you've already got some of the other's produced around this time frame, then you may get more of the same thing you've already got.  It's still pretty funny to watch though and I'm glad I bought it.
I BOUGHT THE VIDEO FOR MY HUSBAND WHO IS A HUGE SPORTSFAN AND I BELIEVE I ENJOYED IT AS MUCH, IF NOT MORE, THAN HE DID. FUNNY AND FUN TO WATCH.  SOME GREAT MEMORIES HERE!
I really enjoyed this video... I love watching sports bloopers... Found a great collection of them online also at [...]

There's more than just stumbles and falls on this video, but still another fun video in the series.  My young boys get a kick out of watching them, but especially enjoy the first two in the Greatest Follies Series.  There's a couple of stories that are repeats from Vol. 3 which was disappointing.
The disc wouldn't work in my dvd player.  Worked in my computer but isn't funny at all.  Too much narration and not enough actual "follies".
very funny dvd will have you laughing guaranteed
My 9 year old son LOVES this video!  He watches it every night for about 15 minutes before bed.  If you have a football enthusiast this video would be a perfect addition to the collection.
This video has some language not suitable for children.  I bought this for my 8 year old son and we had to turn it off due to language.
Gave as a gift. Saw the light in my dad's eyes, when he read the package.
I enjoyed the first three, they are nice to watch, especially with kids who love foot ball!
